page.title: 09Music in the John Neilson
page.content: Staff in the{John Neilson High {School}were interviewed about music. {Pop},{rock}and{folk music}are the most favourite. Most of the staff like classical music; only one or two dislike it.{Handel (the younger)}and {Bach}are the favourite composers.Most of them listen to music on a record player or tape recorder. One of our teachers said he liked the music he played himself.Only one of our teachers would join a pop group. {Miss Mackie}, music teacher, said {she}liked to play old and modern music to her pupils and that the music taught in schools has hardly changed over the years. {Electronic music}is used more in music lessons but recorders, melodicas and glockenspiels are still in use.
